review: After a bad experience at a reputed dental clinic, I booked an appointment at Partha Dental clinic and consulted Nikhitha. She was very good at understanding my issue & guiding me for better dental health, she is friendly indeed and definitely not someone who would suggest you to force into some irrelevant surgeries that might be just a gain for her/clinic. I am happy that dhe understands patients needs rather than keeping her gains at priority. I would definitely consult her to maintain my dental health.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
This is to show my deepest regards towards Dr. Nikitha Kolamala, a resident doctor in Partha Dental & Hair Clinic (AS Rao Nagar Branch). Like many people, I too deferred my dental treatments thinking that they are too costly & are usually not covered by insurance companies.

Finally there came a day where I had to bite the bullet, and see a dentist. And here comes our caring professional Dr. Nikitha, who is passionate about her work, and more than anything, someone who had that patience of a mountain.

When I visited Partha Dental with a hesitation about the treatment costs, Dr. Nikitha examined my gum related issue, and explained me what the issue is, what needs to be done, how much it costs, and how many sittings would it take to complete the treatment along with her availability throughout the length of my treatment.

Dr. Nikitha maintains a transparent relation with the patients, and always let the patients choose what's feasible for them. Gives different options, and appropriate suggestions which put the patients at ease. She discusses the treatment costs accurately, and sets the right expectations at the very beginning of the treatment.

While there was an old saying, "We get our disease cured at the very first sight of the right doctor, although no treatment is done", Dr. Nikitha stands as a true example for that (Especially in today's world).

I personally recommend Partha Dental, especially Dr. Nikitha for her expertise, subject knowledge & a caring attitude.

@Dr. Nikitha, thanks for being sooo kind and caring throughout my treatment sessions, and for treating my family members too.

We thank Partha Dental Team for having extra-ordinary doctors like Dr. K Nikitha, and I am happy that it's not just me, but my family members are happy with her treatment too.

Good Day :)

review: I had irregular teeth since childhood I couldn't smile properly as I was very conscious about my teeth position. My friend suggested me to consult Dr Nikhitha for this problem. Dr checked and explained what needs to be done and gave me multiple options to correct my teeth. Dr explained the benefits of aligners to set my teeth with ease. Within 8 months my teeth got aligned. Thank you Doctor the entire treatment was so comfortable and hassle-free.

tags: None
review: Experienced hairfall since 1 year even after trying many remedies issue was not solved then I consulted Dr Nikhitha kolamala. Mam first asked my history and checked my scalp and hair advised prp and products and some blood tests. After 4 sessions my hair was like 5 years before. Very happy with the results even from the start Dr was very polite and patiently answered my doubts. Now i m taking dental treatment as well for my teeth gaps.

tags: None
review: I have hair fall issue and very thin hair line at the front side of scalp . Even after using many medicines my hair fall problem did not stop.  Finally consulted Dr.Nikhitha at AS Rao nagar partha dental & Cosmo clinic . She was polite and attentive to patients problems . She thoroughly examined my hair fall issue and suggested for Hair PRP and hair restoration. Now after 3 months my hair grew to normal levels .

Dr. Nikhitha was very professional and treated me with great care and friendliness.
